sn22.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
sn22.1:4.3: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.1:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.1:5.1: “Ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:5.2: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ.
sn22.1:6.2: Āturo hāyaṃ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:6.3: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:7.1: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.1:7.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn22.1:7.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
sn22.1:7.6: Alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ savanāyā”ti?
sn22.1:8.2: Idānāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:8.3: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, gahapati, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti?
sn22.1:8.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ etadavocaṃ:
sn22.1:8.7: ‘ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:8.8: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ.
sn22.1:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, maṃ, bhante, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.1:9.3: Āturo hāyaṃ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:9.4: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:9.6: āturakāyassa me sato cittaṃ anāturaṃ bhavissatīti.
sn22.1:9.8: Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:10.1: “Na hi pana taṃ, gahapati, paṭibhāsi bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ paṭipucchituṃ:
sn22.1:10.2: ‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca, kittāvatā ca pana āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto’”ti?
sn22.1:10.3: “Dūratopi kho mayaṃ, bhante, āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
sn22.1:10.4: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
sn22.1:11.1: “Tena hi, gahapati, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
sn22.1:11.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
sn22.1:12.1: “Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti, āturacitto ca?
sn22.1:12.2: Idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:12.3: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:12.5: Tassa ‘ahaṃ rūpaṃ, mama rūpan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:13.1: Vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:13.2: attani vā vedanaṃ, vedanāya vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:13.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:14.1: Saññaṃ attato samanupassati, saññāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:14.2: attani vā saññaṃ, saññāya vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:14.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ saññā, mama saññā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:15.1: Saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:15.2: attani vā saṅkhāre, saṅkhāresu vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:15.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:16.1: Viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:16.2: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:16.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ viññāṇaṃ, mama viññāṇan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṃ viññāṇaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:16.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca.
sn22.1:17.1: Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto?
sn22.1:17.2: Idha, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṃ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:17.3: na attani vā rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:17.4: ‘Ahaṃ rūpaṃ, mama rūpan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:17.5: Tassa ‘ahaṃ rūpaṃ, mama rūpan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:18.1: Na vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, na vedanāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:18.2: na attani vā vedanaṃ, na vedanāya vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:18.3: ‘Ahaṃ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:18.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:19.1: Na saññaṃ attato samanupassati, na saññāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:19.2: na attani vā saññaṃ, na saññāya vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:19.3: ‘Ahaṃ saññā, mama saññā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:19.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ saññā, mama saññā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:20.1: Na saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, na saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:20.2: na attani vā saṅkhāre, na saṅkhāresu vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:20.3: ‘Ahaṃ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:20.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:21.1: Na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.1:21.2: na attani vā viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.1:21.3: ‘Ahaṃ viññāṇaṃ, mama viññāṇan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:21.4: Tassa ‘ahaṃ viññāṇaṃ, mama viññāṇan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṃ viññāṇaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:21.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo hoti no ca āturacitto”ti.
sn22.1:22.2: Attamano nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
